Mrs. Daniel Cooper Shoots Husband, Six Children and Herself.” The newspaper’s choice of the words farm, township and city is striking. By today’s standards the Cadillac, Michigan, of 1908 was a very small town. We might even question the appropriateness of using the word city to describe it. However, a century ago, the contrast between farming and town and city living was stark and potentially ominous
